content: bly socks by caoua coffee materials 400yards/370m fingering weight sock yarn sample online cotton stretch 40% wool 40%cotton 16% poly 4% elité needles us1 / 2 25mm or size needed to obtain gauge 1 split ring stitch marker tapestry needle size women s us 7-9 gauge 34 sts / 46 row= 4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k = knit stitch k2tog = knit 2 together p = purl stitch p2tog = purl 2 together rs = right side / public side sl yb = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in back back = the side away from you sl yf = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in front front = the side closest to you ssk = slip 1 knit wise slip 1 purl wise knit both stitches together through the back loops st s = stitch es ws = wrong side / private side ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved bly v 1 1 page 1/5 bly socks - by caoua coffee 1/1 lc = 2 stitch left leaning cross approaching from the back insert the tip of the right needle into the back of the 2nd stitch on the left needle drop 2 sts off the left needle and pick up the loose stitch from the front with the left needle transfer 1 stitch back from right needle to left needle k2 1/1 rc = 2 stitch right leaning cross approaching from the front insert the tip of the right needle into the 2nd stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 2 sts off the left needle and pick up the loose stitch from the back with the left needle transfer 1 stitch back from right needle to left needle k2 1/2 rtw = 3 stitch right leaning twist approaching from the front insert the tip of the right needle into the 2nd and 3rd stitch on the left needle drop 3 sts off the left needle and pick up the loose stitch from the back with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k2 p1 2/1 ltw = 3 stitch left leaning twist approaching from the back insert the tip of the right needle into the back of the 3rd stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 3 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the front with the left needle transfer 1 stitch back from right needle to left needle p1 k2 2/2 lc = 4 stitch left leaning cable approaching from the back insert the tip of the right needle into the back of the 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the front with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 2/2 rc = 4 stitch right leaning cable approaching from the
